you will now return to 1x1 rib - mult of 2 sts working in the round all rnds *k1 p1 repeat from * to end next round techniques step 1 k1 closing up gap between 2 sides and long tail cast-on i like using the thumb method rejoining to work in round of this cast-on bit ly/3pdbgvc step 2 insert ln into 2nd st in on the rn the pfkb purl front knit back purl into the front of new st that was created from the pfkb on previous row and lift it up and over the st you just knit the next st but before you take it off of the ln knit the last st on the rn and off the needle into the back of this same st and then slide st off the needle 1 st increase d step 3 slip st from rn to ln pm for bor on rn then slip st back from ln to rn abbreviations step 4 p1 *k1 p1 repeat from * to end approx = approximately bobble = bind off top bor = beginning of round circ = circular co = cast on increase d = increase d next round *k1 p1
